PedroPathing/com.pedropathing.util/CustomPIDFCoefficients

CustomPIDFCoefficients

public class CustomPIDFCoefficients

This is the CustomPIDFCoefficients class. This class handles holding coefficients for PIDF controllers.

This creates a new CustomPIDFCoefficients with constant PID coefficients and a variable feedforward equation using a FeedForwardConstant.
